description.schinese: 升级10个强化
击杀100个敌人而不升级

description.english: Survive 10 minutes without taking any damage.
description.schinese: 在不受任何伤害的情况下生存10分钟
击杀100个首领(Boss）
击败死亡天使

description.english: Defeat all bosses of a depth.
description.schinese: 击败某一深度的所有首领(Boss）
发现一个强化的协同效应

description.english: Defeat all bosses of a depth without taking any damage.
description.schinese: 击败某一深度的所有首领(Boss）时不受任何伤害

description.english: As Misty, turn 1337 enemies into frogs.
description.schinese: 作为迷雾，将1337名敌人变成青蛙。

description.english: Survive all four depths without taking any damage.
description.schinese: 在不受任何伤害的情况下生存所有四个深度
达到20级
达到30级
作为阿里克，在腐化森林D1生存

description.english: As Aric, survive all four depths.
description.schinese: 作为阿里克，生存所有四个深度
作为恩博，在腐化森林D1生存

description.english: As Ember, survive all four depths.
description.schinese: 作为恩博，生存所有四个深度
作为冰柱，生存到深度1。

description.english: As Icicle, survive all four depths.
description.schinese: 作为冰霜，生存所有四个深度
作为凯托，在腐化森林D1生存

description.english: As Kaito, survive all four depths.
description.schinese: 作为凯托，生存所有四个深度
作为米斯提，在腐化森林D1生存

description.english: As Misty, survive all four depths.
description.schinese: 作为米斯提，生存所有四个深度
击杀10,000个敌人
作为兹克，在腐化森林D1生存

description.english: As Zikk, survive all four depths.
description.schinese: 作为兹克，生存所有四个深度

description.english: Survive Corrupted Forest with one hero.
description.schinese: 在腐化森林D1中仅使用一个英雄生存

description.english: Survive Orc Kingdom with two heroes.
description.schinese: 在兽人王国D2中以两名英雄生存

displayName.schinese: 被遗忘的地下墓穴幸存者

description.english: Survive Forgotten Crypt with three heroes.
description.schinese: 在被遗忘的地下墓穴D3中以三名英雄生存
在地狱D4中以四名英雄生存

description.english: As Ember, survive a run with 5 ice perks.
description.schinese: 作为恩博，在5个冰霜强化的情况下生存一局

description.english: As Icicle, survive a run with 5 fire perks.
description.schinese: 作为恩博，在5个冰霜强化的情况下生存一局
触碰你的第一只蝴蝶
在一局中触碰10只蝴蝶
获得10个解锁项
作为贡德尔，在腐化森林D1生存

description.english: As Gundel, survive all four depths.
description.schinese: 作为贡德尔，生存所有四个深度
达到40级
作为艾菲，在腐化森林D1生存

description.english: As Effy, survive all four depths.
description.schinese: 作为艾菲，生存所有四个深度
击杀100,000个敌人
在没有攻击的情况下生存3分钟
总共触碰300只蝴蝶

description.english: Survive a run with at least 250 unspent coins.
description.schinese: 在一局中保留至少250个未花费的金币生存
同时拥有5个伙伴

description.english: Spend a total of 1000 coins at the Undead Merchant.
description.schinese: 在商人处花费总共1000个金币

description.english: As Santa, survive all four depths.
description.schinese: 作为圣诞老人，生存所有四个深度
作为圣诞老人，在腐化森林D1生存

description.english: Survive with at least 4 physical and 4 arcane perks.
description.schinese: 生存时至少拥有4个物理强化和4个奥术强化

description.english: Survive all four depths without attacking once.
description.schinese: 在没有攻击的情况下生存所有四个深度

description.english: Defeat the Angel of Death without any damage modifiers from perks and items.
description.schinese: 击败死亡天使时不使用任何强化和物品的伤害修饰符

description.english: Reach level 40 with just one projectile.
description.schinese: 仅使用一个投射物达到40级
在一局中击杀20,000个敌人
作为达里亚，在腐化森林D1生存

description.english: As Daria, survive all four depths.
description.schinese: 作为达里亚，生存所有四个深度

description.english: Die with at least 10 remaining rerolls.
description.schinese: 在剩余至少10次重置机会的情况下死亡
作为风，在腐化森林D1生存

description.english: As Kaze, survive all four depths.
description.schinese: 作为风，生存所有四个深度
作为疯，在腐化森林D1生存

description.english: As Mad, survive all four depths.
description.schinese: 作为疯，生存所有四个深度
作为莫斯曼，在腐化森林D1生存

description.english: As Mothman, survive all four depths.
description.schinese: 作为莫斯曼，生存所有四个深度
击败掠食蘑菇
击败巴尔洛格

description.english: As Gundel, survive a run with 0 remaining rerolls.
description.schinese: 作为贡德尔，在没有剩余重置机会的情况下生存一局

description.english: As Kaito or Kaze, reach a crit rate of over 70%.
description.schinese: 作为凯托或风，达到超过70%的暴击率

description.english: As Mad, survive a run after banishing 5 perks.
description.schinese: 作为疯，在驱逐5个强化后生存一局
达到50级
击败哥布林王
获得50个解锁项

description.english: Let your gambling addiction steal all your dice.
description.schinese: 让你的“赌瘾”夺走你所有的骰子。
同时获得7个史诗强化
作为诺瓦，在腐化森林D1生存

description.english: As Nova, survive all four depths.
description.schinese: 作为诺瓦，生存所有四个深度

description.english: As Nova, defeat a map boss while he is trapped in a black hole.
description.schinese: 作为诺娃，在地图 Boss 被困在黑洞中时将其击败。

description.english: Survive Nightmare 5 without spending any talent points.
description.schinese: 在噩梦5中生存而不花费任何天赋点数。
花费你的第一个天赋点。
花费10个天赋点。
驱逐100个稀有强化
驱逐25个史诗强化
驱逐5个传奇强化

description.english: Slay a wealthy boss while you have zero gold.
description.schinese: 在没有任何金币的情况下击杀一名富有的首领(Boss）

description.english: Reach a win streak of 5 with any hero.
description.schinese: 使用任何英雄达到5连胜

description.english: Evade 100 attacks with the help of a frog.
description.schinese: 在蛙的帮助下躲避100次攻击
采集蜂巢20次。
作为克罗克，在腐化森林D1生存

description.english: As Croak, survive all four depths.
description.schinese: 作为克罗克，生存所有四个深度

description.english: Discover all perks in your Collection.
description.schinese: 在你的收藏中发现所有强化
生存噩梦1
生存噩梦2
生存噩梦3

description.english: Face a map boss on a map with three negative mods.
description.schinese: 在拥有三个负面改造的地图中挑战地图Boss。
